entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:44 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
